comment: This was such an easy class, also very very interesting. Theres 4 discussions and 7 Quizzes. They're all on D2L open note. I enjoyed the discussions as they were all very sports driven. Theres 1 group orject at the end of the semester and he picked our classmates but it went well for me! def take for the credit.
rating_tags: Caring--Graded by few things--Accessible outside class
